ccsc.title: Works Cited
ccsc.default_style: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author if author else '' }}{% if title is defined and author is defined %}{{title|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif title is defined %}{{title|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

journal.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|add_chars(', ') if author else '' }}{{title|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{journal|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if journal else ''}}{{volume|add_chars(', ') if volume else '' }}{{issue|wrap(')')|add_chars(', ') if issue else ''}}{{pages if pages else ''}}{% if pages is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

book.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|add_chars(', ') if author else '' }}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{city|add_chars(': ') if city else ''}}{{publisher if publisher else '' }}{% if publisher is defined and year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', ')}}{% elif year is defined %}{{year|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}

internet.template: {{num|wrap(']')|add_chars(' ') if num else ''}}{{author|add_chars(', ') if author else '' }}{{title|wrap_html('i')|add_chars(', ') if title else '' }}{{year|add_chars(', ') if year else ''}}{{url if url else ''}}{% if url is defined and retrieved is defined %}{{retrieved|add_chars('.')|add_to_front(', retrieved ')}}{% elif retrieved is defined %}{{year|add_to_front('retrieved ')|add_chars('.')}}{% else %}{{'.'}}{% endif %}
